column4: my monitor can handle 1024*768 resolution but when i change resolution from 800*600 to 1024*786 the display is shifted
you mean shifted to left or right?
which vdeo card do you have there ...if not sure ,,open a terminal and copy paste this command         lspci | grep -i vga
ok  if the image of the desktop has shifted left or right you may have to use the controls on the monitor itself  to adjust the image
